Perceptor::


"Before I took the name Perceptor the predacon,  I was the decepticon 
Blindfear" answered Perceptor"I was a Predacon now I'm Decepticon one 
more time"


After said that he fired two missiles to Ice










--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Knowing that the Decepticons wouldn't settle for talking the 
problems out Ice transformed to her owl form and flew above the 
city. "The shields didn't recognize mutant signatures last time I was 
in the nrighborhood." she thought deciding it would be best not to 
try entering while the battle was going on. The Decepticons were a 
bit bigger than she was and she wasn't one to try to go hand to hand 
if she didn't know the outcome. If Lunarpine had taught her one thing 
it was that she was no fighter. If she was to get through this it 
wato be by intelligence, not force. "Maximals, we're getting nowhere 
fighting individual battles. move together and I can direct you."  
knowing also about the dease fire between the black fortress 
Predacons and the Maximals she could use a little 
psychology. "Perceptor, you are seriously pushing the agreement that 
was aranged a while back, turn and leave and maybe you'll save the 
faith." Logic had always been her strong suit over brute force now 
her Maximal back ground was needed over her mutant powers. "Maximals 
inside the city, as the senior Maximal here I'm assuming command, 
check the records under SHADOW WING if you please to back up my 
claims."
> 
> Mustex moved forward "I'm with you Ice." he rose his rifle and 
fired five more pulse blasts from his rifle, this time targeting the 
target master Triggerhappy
